sentences.en: Anything outside that time - frame means you must reassess your position and act decisively.
sentences.cn: 任何超出这个周期的事情,对你来说,意味着需要重新评估你的位置并果断的行动.

sentences.en: How then should China reassess its priorities within the global economic system?
sentences.cn: 那么中国应当怎样重估其在全球经济体系中的优先事宜 呢 ?

sentences.en: However, we will reassess the bearish view if any upmove goes above 113.00.
sentences.cn: 但是,如果任何上升超过113.00, 我们将再评价笨拙的意见.

sentences.en: I have also begun to reassess my own feelings about being a woman.
sentences.cn: 我也开始重新审视自己对身为女性的感受。

sentences.en: I will reassess the situation when I get home.
sentences.cn: 我回家的时候会再看看情形。

sentences.en: It is time pull back and reassess all that you have learned lately.
sentences.cn: 是回顾和重估你近来所学的东西的时候了.

sentences.en: It is time to reassess your relationship with yourcomputer.
sentences.cn: 到了重新评价你和你的电脑的关系时候了.

sentences.en: This has caused us to reassess the way we approach our planning.
sentences.cn: 这件事让我们重新审视了我们的规划方式。

sentences.en: What is crucial at this time is reassess an earlier situation or decision.
sentences.cn: 这时候紧要的问题是将之前的状况或决定再重新评估一遍.

sentences.en: When challenged, it's quick to reassess, adjust, and try again.
sentences.cn: 当遇到挑战时, 就会很快的重新评价自己, 调整, 并再试一次.

sentences.en: You know it is time to reassess your relationship with your computer when.
sentences.cn: 当发生下列事情时,你就该明白应重新衡量你和你的电脑的关系了.

words.tran_cn: 重新评估；[经] 重新估价；重新考虑

trans.tran_cn: 再估价，再评价，再课税，再摊派
trans.tran_en: to think about something again carefully in order to decide whether to change your opinion or judgment about it
to think about something again carefully in order to decide whether to change your opinion or judgment about it
